articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.title: Motorola is bringing the wooden phone back with its new Edge series - The Verge
articles.description: Motorola is debuting a trio of new Edge phones, including a 50 Ultra with a “real wood” back panel option.
articles.content:

articles.title: Winchcombe meteorite's history revealed by fresh analysis - BBC.com
articles.description: Researchers say the Winchcombe meteorite is "a remarkable piece of space history".

articles.title: Arm skin patch system could warn of organ rejection - BBC.com
articles.description: A rash appearing on the patch could allow early treatment to stop problems escalating.
